comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: "Lizard Point (from Cornish: an Lysardh meaning "the high court") in Cornwall is at the southern tip of the Lizard Peninsula. Lizard Point is the most southerly point on mainland Great Britain at 49° 57' 30" N. With the exception of parts of the Isles of Scilly it is the southernmost part of England." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lizard_Point,_Cornwall en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lizard_Lighthouse
